localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: LazyWeb is a conversational search engine with a simple chat interface free from ads and tracking. It's like messaging a smart friend that answers questions and sends you useful links. It's the first search engine where you control how results display.
nodes.title: LazyWeb Alpha - Search without ads or tracking. View results how you want.
nodes.author: Angela Hoover

nodes.excerpt: Airy is an Open Source Conversational Platform to store, structure and utilize conversational data in a secure and privacy-compliant way. Airy can power a variety of use cases, from hosting your own Messaging API to integrating with Conversational AI.
nodes.title: Airy - Open source conversational platform & unified messaging APIs

nodes.excerpt: Zing makes it easy to ask questions on the go from your database (PostgreSQL, with more to come) for free in just a few taps: * Ask questions * Search for data * Create visualizations and tables * Chat with your team..from wherever you are.
nodes.title: Zing Data - Free collaborative analytics designed for your phone

nodes.excerpt: OpenPhone is an all-in-one business phone for startups. It comes with powerful calling, messaging, and a lightweight CRM. It allows you to share a phone number with your team and collaborate on conversations. Available on mobile, web, and desktop.
nodes.title: OpenPhone for Teams - The all-in-one business phone, now made collaborative

nodes.excerpt: Spot is a virtual office loaded with the collaboration and communication functionality a high-performing team needs: voice and video, screen-sharing, and chat all at the team's fingertips.
nodes.title: Spot - The virtual hub for your organization
nodes.author: Gordon Hempton

nodes.excerpt: Launch a conversational chatbot on your website in minutes to automate support. Pre-trained with SaaS FAQs. Deflects 65% of conversations. Use API to authenticate users, give personalized answers. Bot chats in any language out-of-the-box. Built-in live chat.
nodes.title: alphachat - Automate your SaaS support with powerful conversational AI

nodes.excerpt: Geneva is an all-in-one communication app for groups, clubs, and communities. Chat, post, hangout, livestream, plan, and more â€” itâ€™s everything your group needs to stay connected, all in one place. The app is free to use and live on iPhone, Android, & Web.
nodes.title: Geneva - An all-in-one communication app for groups & communities

nodes.excerpt: Duckly enables teams to talk and collaborate in real-time with a Figma-like experience for any website, localhost, IDE, or even a terminal session.
nodes.title: Duckly - Collaborate on any page with a Figma-like experience
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: WhatsApp Chatbots can engage with millions of prospects for providing customer support on the most widely-used messaging app. Almost any business can take advantage of chatbots.
nodes.title: Botsify - No-Code chatbot automation for WhatsApp business API
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: The Streaming Guide for iMessage allows you to quickly share the hottest Movies and TV Shows with friends. All you have to do is search, tap, and send.
nodes.title: The Streaming Guide - Share movies & TV with friends

nodes.excerpt: Boost your sales via instant video calls based on your customer behavior. Vidiwise is a no-code videocall platform that lets you connect with your visitors in just 1-click.
nodes.title: Vidiwise - 1-click video calls based on your visitor's journey, free
nodes.author: Wilhelm Rahn

nodes.excerpt: Private chatrooms for founders are AWESOME! Start your own room or join existing ones and have the right conversations at the right time. Once a room has 10 founders in, it cannot be accessed by anyone else. Boost your startup and have fun!
nodes.title: Sshush - Private chatrooms for founders that disappear in 24 hrs
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Ensemble makes it simple to start a chat-focused community that makes money from subscriptions. Packed with automated subscription management, integrated billing, custom branding, business analytics dashboard and unlimited users/chatrooms/history.
nodes.title: Ensemble Chat - Turn your fans into recurring customers

nodes.excerpt: Telegram messenger has released two new web versions of the application. They perform all basic functions and are available on mobile and desktop devices.
nodes.title: New Telegram Web - Modern web messenger for mobile and desktop

nodes.excerpt: Does your SaaS product have multiple users per account, or multiple accounts per user? Unlike other email automation tools, Userlist now supports companies, and allows you to onboard and engage teams in a smart way.
nodes.title: Company Accounts by Userlist - Email the right user at the right time
nodes.author: Charlie Irish

nodes.excerpt: Tidio is an intuitive, no-coding chatbot tool that improves your live chat with automation that you can control.
nodes.title: Tidio - Live chat bot to boost customer engagement & sales

nodes.excerpt: Watch, share, and record video messages on the go with Loom for Android.
nodes.title: Loom for Android - Mobile screen recordings with a cam bubble

nodes.excerpt: Our new Slack App: Bring Process Street into Slack to manage and automate all your workflows in one place. Handle tasks, forms and approvals in a few taps, without needing to leave Slack. Process Street makes your team's recurring work fun, fast and faultless.

nodes.excerpt: Memo enriches your conversations making it super easy to share links, videos, galleries and loads more. Comment on any word, sentence or paragraph in Memo messages. Send longer-form messages with rich media embedded to anyone using their email address.
nodes.title: Memo - Async conversations with your friends, fans, and team
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Slack Connect allows you to send direct messages to people outside your company, simplifying the way you work with partners. Use this feature to seamlessly schedule meetings, sign documents and quickly collaborate on important tasks without ever leaving Slack.
nodes.title: Slack Connect Direct Messages - DM anyone outside your company from Slack
